title: A Celebration of SGPIA at 15 & a Tribute to Michael Cohen, Founding Director
desc: Please join faculty, staff, alumni, and current students in the Julien J. Studley Graduate Program in International Affairs to celebrate the 15th anniversary of our program and the work of Michael Cohen, our Founding Director.? Following a reception, faculty and alumni will give mini-talks that explore how key problems of international affairs have changed since SGPIA?s creation in 2001.?After the presentations, all are invited to catch up with faculty, alumni, staff, and students over food and drinks.
